mapper.select: SELECT p.project_id AS projectId, p.project_name AS projectName, SUM(c.total_pay) AS totalPay, p.created_date AS createdDate, p.manager AS manager, c.status AS projectStatus, MIN(a.apply_date) AS applyDate, MAX(a.is_approved) AS isApproved FROM contract c JOIN project p ON c.project_id = p.project_id JOIN apply a ON c.apply_id = a.apply_id GROUP BY p.project_id, p.project_name, p.created_date, p.manager, c.status ORDER BY p.project_id DESC
